dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the state corporation "Government for Citizens, the operating hours of Public Service Centers (PSC) and Special PSCs in Kazakhstan will change due to the upcoming March holidays. The holiday schedule is as follows: Kazakhstan has officially designated March 8-10 and March 21-25 as public holidays.

dialogue_turns.text: No, it's, uh, specific dates. March 8th to 10th. And then again, March 21st through the 25th.
